Info.Description:
Cloud Cover Removal
Removes the cloud cover on the map when the radio towers are unlocked. I personally find it a tad silly that the map is covered by clouds which magically disappear when the player liberates a radio tower. Also, this will allow for full map visibility without having to liberate towers and having to listen to "Radio Freaky Rat" throughout the rest of the game.
Changes made by this mod: [list] [*] The cloud cover on the world map is removed from the start. [*] The minimap is visible even when the nearest radio tower has not been liberated. [/list]
Warnings: [*] This mod may not be co-op friendly. [*] In case of any bugs, please email me at linkhero95@gmail.com, or contact me at the Far Cry series modding discord.
